name: SleepFuture
description: Sleep Future is the world’s first blockchain-driven sleep wellness ecosystem to improve the sleep quality and health of the global community through a deeply intertwined ecosystem of sleep2earn, physical stores, online marketplace, education, data intelligence, sleep specialists and more. Sleep Future introduces the world’s first Sleep-To-Earn mechanism to reward world-wide community to sleep and earn $SLEEPEE tokens with the dual objective of innovating sleep technology R&D and a real-world utility in the Sleep Future ecosystem. Sleepfuture's ecosystem consists of sleeptown experience centres, sleepee monitoring apps, sleep doctor consultations, sleepee marketplace store, sleep wellness education and sleep cloud data intelligence. Sleepfuture's state-of-the-art sleepee NFTs and gacha boosting system also allow holders to maximise and boost their earnings while they sleep.
